113.content:
Your name is Jake your a young teenager in a small forest town. What was always considered a boring normal town is now considered very special even if you still find it boring. It has been two years since the furry's appeared and built their society over the remains of human society and since then your small town has become a human sanctuary. A place where humans can live in peace and not worry about being captured or hurt, it is one of over 200 cities that... blah blah. All that really meant to you was that you went from living in a boring town to not being allowed to leave the boring town.

One reason you hated the rule was the boundary set for the city made it so any hideout you had before the takeover was now off limits. You hated the rule but, you did obey until that one day you had a fight with your mom, over something petty it was an argument dumb enough that you didn't even remember the reason by the time you calmed down.

But that moment of anger was enough to change your life as you decide you didn't care about the rules you wanted to go to your old hideout so you were going to go. You get out of the town and find your old hideout find that your comic collection was still where you hide it so you stayed there reading it you calmed down. That when you realized that in those two year you forgot how to find your way back home. So you walk the forest lost until you hear a rustling in the trees, as you cross a clearing, you look to see two eyes looking down at you.

You stood there in shock for a moment you were always told how big the furrys are but looking it in the eyes you knew it was far larger then anything you have ever seen. So you quickly turn to run away but it moves faster, faster is an understatement as it could outrun you if you both were the same size, It blocks your path and you now see that those eyes belonged to...
113.title: Young Teen (13-16 Years)

choices: her parents house with or without siblings
1131.content:
As you turned to run the eyes quickly got around you to block your path. It enters the clearing blocking your path on all fours and eyes, sticking out from under a hoodie, that feel like it is stalking prey, until it looks you over then you and it's eyes soften. It hops forward into a squat and lifts the hood for you to see the the predictor was a female around 19 years old with black fur and dyed red hair and she had the biggest amber eyes you ever seen. she was wearing a dark green sleeveless and unzipped hoodie over a sports bra that was holding in some very large breasts. She had on spandex shorts and tennis shoes and appeared to be out for a jog. She sat there watching patiently as you looked her over then when she felt you had enough time she leans in to examine and smell you.

When she leans in she starts to talk to you, "Sorry for that thought I found a little rodent (wild human) but your so clean are you a lost pet?" You hesitate for a moment before saying, "I'm... I'm not a pet but I am lost I am part of the human sanctuary." Her face lights up when she hears you. she starts a rapid fire of questions about like, how many people, do furry visit, do you like it, and so on. You answer her question the best you could and it quickly becomes a long conversation.

She explains that her name is Amber and that humans like you without pet tags are considered rodents and the finder can do whatever they want with them. Then she winks and informs you that means she is now your master unless she wants to eat you. Then she does a biting motion towards you to make her point. Intimidated by her remark you try to back up but she moves her arm behind you Then laying down she traps you in a circle she makes with her arms and she rests her head over her arm asking, "Why are you trying to run?" As you look her in the eyes you can't tell if shes playing or actually hurt so you apologize timidly.

She smiles and forgives you as she picks you up and lays on her back before setting you between her breasts. When you land on her fur your so surprised by the softness that you zone out as your rub your face against it. She giggles and says, "If you want to get friendly..." Then she squeezes both her boobs together and jiggles them for a bit. Then after releasing you she sits up which causes you to fall in her cleavage. Then she just gets up and goes back to the path and returns to her jog she was doing when she originally smelled you. After her job she returns home to...
1131.title: Canine

11312.content:
The ride back to her place tossed you back and forward but, luckily you were in a very welly padded area. After about 10 mins she stops jogging and begins to walk. You are still stuck inside her cleavage unaware of what is happening around you but, at least the slowed pace allowed you to get your bearing. The only thing that you can see besides the furry mountains on either side is Amber's face which looked more beautiful the longer you looked at it.

Soon she stops and tells you that we are here before reaching in to pull you out. You look at the house as she walks up and it was the largest building you think you ever seen. She brings you in and shows you the two bedroom house and you think its amazing how this house probably the size of your entire town is only considered cozy to Amber's size. She notices your reaction and finds it quite enjoyable to show you things she finds normal like her 30 ft TV, gigantic bed, and other things. When she is done she puts you on her couch's armrest and turns on the tv before telling you she will be back after a shower. You tryed to use the remote she left but, after realizing it takes your full body weight to change the channel you decide what she had on was fine.

In a few mins you hear the shower stop and soon after she comes out with a towel around her head, for the long hair, a black t- shirt and skull PJ's. You stare for a bit before she happily teases, "flattery will get everywhere, little boy." You blush and look away as she sits next to you. Then she picks you up as she moved positions to lay on the armrest. When she gets all settled in she sets you on her stomach. It was interesting sitting there cause the fur made it very soft and inviting but you could also feel under the coat she had pretty hard abs so you assume she often worked out.

She asked if there was anything you wanted to watch and you tell her you don't know any shows cause your town hasn't had TV other then news for two years. So she flips through the channel and you both watch for a bit till you finally feel you need to ask the obvious question. "Do you consider me your property?" She mutes the TV and looks at you. As she sits there thinking you began to get nervous. Then to your surprise she asks, "do you want to be?" Then she goes on to explain that she can buy stuff that would allow you to move around the house freely and the pet tags are cheap. You think about it staying with her does sound very temping but your family doesn't know what happened to you. Then you remember that Amber found you looking for a snack for all you know you really would just be answering if you want to be a pet or food.

She sees that its a hard decision for you so she says, "I can't just let you back in the forest when it is so dark out so how bout this we have dinner, hangout till bed, then in the morning you can give me your answer." You agree so you both do just that, eat she is an amazing cook by the way, then she plays some video games while you watch then you both go to sleep her in a bed and you on a folded up towel on her night stand.

You wake up to Amber poking you. She brings you into the kitchen where breakfast was already prepared. You both eat and after the meal she asks if you made a decision and you say...
11312.title: her own house

113122.content:
You hesitate to answer cause after two years in your boring town her offer seems to be everything you wanted but, you think about how worried your family must be. Amber sees this and gives a suggestion. "I need to go to class this afternoon I can leave you near the sanctuary, you can tell people your fine, pack some cloths and leave for me to take you back."

"What if I just stay in the town?" you retort.

She leans in with a playful smile, "well, then you would be a boring little boy." Then she heads toward her bedroom. As she walks away you watch her butt sway side to side in an almost dramatic fashion. Then after a few steps she stops and looks over her shoulder to say, "You can't say no to this butt anyway." Your face turns red and you quickly turn away knowing that you fell for her trap hook line and sinker. She laughs as she walks away to go get changed and she comes back in with a black T, great looking jeans, Boots, and the green hoodie from yesterday. She grabs her backpack then you.

She softly pets you as she takes you back home. Amber's petting and peaceful walking pace completely relax you to the point of barely staying awake. You look out at the city as she walks and notice for the first time that human really are just pets in this world. This culture shock starts to freak you out but, then you hear Amber softly shh you and soon her petting soothes away your anxiety. Soon she walks into a park and follows a walking trail but, after a while she goes off into the forest.

She softly sets you down and points you toward your town then she tells you to be at this spot at 7 tonight. You thank her and go back into town to a mother worried sick. You get everything settled with the town your family doesn't want you to go but allow you to choose. So you leave with your bag and arrive at 6:45 at the meet up.

114.content:
Once again you woke up without much reason to do so. For the last four years you've been living in this cage in the local pet shop ever since the Transformation. The moment it happened you knew everything would change. Humans only live because of an agreement to let other animals become masters to us. Oh well, at least you're not dead. Although you're life would only be less exciting if you were dead. Everyday you got up, sat around in your cage, ate, talked to your friends in the adjacent cages, and most crushingly, never get fucking bought!

Today though you woke up, still bleary-eyed to see a stranger looking at you in your cage. Though you couldn't see too well yet having just woke up you could tell that it was...

11411.content:
As your eyes finally adjusted you saw the face of a wolf stating at you. As soon as your eyes met you notice he gave a small smile. After seeing that you couldn't hold in your excitement was he really going to buy you. As a big grin formed on your face it ended up not lasting long as after looking at you a bit longer he stood up straight and walked away. After watching the wolf walk out of your field of view you went and sulked back to your bed. This wasn't the first time your hopes had been crushed.

There were two kinds of human pets in this world the ones who are fine with being pets and others that aren't. You belonged in the category that being a pet was fine. You actually liked being around the giants. Sometimes some of the workers here would take you out for a little bit of fun since you've been here for 4 years. Even if you were about to be 20 the thought of playing hide and seek with someone much more bigger than you excited you.

Just as you were thinking if you were ever going to be bought you heard a tap on cage. Turning around you saw it was the same wolf from earlier. You saw him open his mouth to say something but you couldn't hear him as the humans cages were built so neither human or anthro could talk to each other as sometimes problems would arise if they got into arguments. It wasn't long after though that you heard the door to your cage open up behind you. What soon came in though was a brown furred hand you were familiar with. Knowing that the hand was here to pick you up. Not wasting any time you got unto to palm and were whisked out of your cage and brought up to the face of the otter whose name was Geoff. He was one of the few workers here that would pay attention to you and play some games with you.

"Hey looks like someone finally bought you I bet your excited." The giant otter told you as he rubbed your stomach with one of his fingers. You never really cared for belly rubs before but when it was by one of the giant anthros you liked the feeling of the fur against your bare skin. "I am but I'm also going to miss you." You told the otter as you were reaching the door so you could meet your new owner. "Don't say that we'll probably see each other again since your vet is going to be from this store so you'll he back every once in a while so I'll make sure to visit you when you're here." Geoff told you while flashing a big smile. Getting red with embarrassment you looked down at his palm left to wonder if the giant otter knew of your affections for him. You soon reached the door and you finally got a good look at your owner. The first thing you noticed was that he...
11411.title: A wolf.

114111.content:
As you couldn't get a good look at his body earlier you inspected him the moment you could. Not to say you ha standards but you did want to look at how your new owner looked. As you looked his body over you noticed he had a good amount of muscle not too much but he also wasn't lightly muscled either. His huge cock didn't escape your notice either. After you finished giving him a quick look over you noticed him walking around Geoff to get a look at you. "You know if you want you can hold him." Geoff told the wolf as he looked at you intently.

"Huh.. do you think it'll be okay I've never had a human before but I have interacted with some before and the ones I have are a little nervous with strangers." The wolf said surprising you. Even though he could grab you and you would be powerless he still considered your feeling even though those weren't your feelings but still he tried. "It's okay if you want I'm fine with you holding me." You said with a loud voice to the giant wolf. "There you see you can't argue with the human himself." Geoff said as he handed you to the wolf. "You're sure I can hold you right?" The wolf asked with a slightly worried tone. This wolf actually surprised you, here you were thinking he would be a master who wouldn't care to much about your feelings but you were proven wrong. "Yes you can I trust you." You told him. "Ok then." The wolf said as he put out his palm for you. Geoff put you over the paw and let you jump down yourself. As you stood on the palm of the wolf he stared at you some more and when he was satisfied he told Geoff he was ready to take you. After Geoff finished going over the rules to the wolf over again about their human policy. The wolf had to sign some papers and then you officially became his. As you left the store in the wolfs palm at the entrance he lifted you up to his face. "I know you probably heard my name already but I haven't really introduced myself my name is Rick." Your owner Rick told you. "Well I have an actual name but my nickname from the store is squirt so you can call me that if you want or you can call my Eddy which is what the other humans in the store called me." You told Rick as you gave him a quick smile. Smiling back he said, "That's good I'll decide what to call you later but now we need to go..."

1141111.title: To your new home

choices: Tell your new owner your name.
11412.content:
As you focused in you saw him, a massive set of blue eyes hidden behind an even big pair of glasses as well as the dark grey brown of a triangular nose. You could tell he was HUGE even without seeing the rest of him as the giant maned head looked around at you from all angles. His long, blond mane flowed from his had and down his shoulders and even under the chin, he was hairy and... a tad sweaty if your nose told you anything.

“This guys kinda cute.” The massive lion thooms overhead to the store manager.

         You pay attention to what could very well be your new owner as he walks away and the first thing you can tell is her really is HUGE as you surmised before, standing a good foot or two over everyone else in the store. He was wearing athletic clothes, a tank top that showed his bulging pecs and draped over his pudgy belly, shorts that looked way too tight no matter what angle you viewed them from, from the back displaying the generously sized and perfectly round butt and to the from they hugged his equally jaw dropping manhood, they looked like they were practically painted on. Below was two pairs of athletic shoes, old, scuffed but large in their own right, they needed to be to cover such paws. Overall he was breathtaking, he was exceptionally well built with bulging muscles everywhere you looked but on top of all that he seemed to be mostly unaware of how stunning he was given the happy little smile he wore the entire time we was in the store, even as his giant, clumsy tail whipped around, knocking things off shelves. Needless to say you were very much infatuated with this unbelievably sexy stud of a lion and would have no problem calling him your owner.

“That’s very good, would you like to hold him?” The owner asked, scooting past the large bulge and belly of the lion to get to the human cages.

“Oh yeah! That’d be awesome, thank you!” He said excitedly, following after the shorter manager.

         You sat, a little afraid of what to expect as the owners large paws undid the latch on your cage and reached in to pick you up with ease before pulling you out. It was strange, seeing the store from a different perspective for the first time since you and your fellow humans were stacked there but you didn’t have long to dwell on the thought before the manager spun around and raised his paws slightly to the lion who now looked even bigger than before as he loomed over you like a smiling colossus.

“Make sure you support the legs, they can be a bit unsteady at first but after a while they get used to being held.” He says, handing you off to the noticeably bigger paws of the lion.

“Oh my god! He so tiny!” He says excitedly, holding you on the soft, doughy pad of his paw which matched the color of his nose. “He’s so cute, I mean... like just look at how little his limbs are, I’m worried I might hurt him.” He says, gingerly cupping you in his paw as he pokes a plump, feline digit at you, trying his hardest to pet you with one finger but most of the time not even touching you at all. “He seems pretty calm.” He says, after holding you a bit and truth be told you did feel pretty calm in his paws, you felt like you knew he wouldn’t hurt you... intentionally at least.

“Oh yes, all of our humans are calm, we make sure to get the ones like that because we find they take to their owners easier.” He says, speaking about your kind like they weren’t sentient. “The rest we usually keep around for ourselves for some anthro training, getting them acquainted with the prospect of creatures bigger than them interacting with them. Some have trouble with the prospect but this little guy seems right at home with you. So do you think you’ll take him?” He says, smiling at the oversized cat.

“Oh yeah, absolutely!” The lion stud says, still kinda petting you sometimes with one finger.

“Excellent, I’ll just put him back and get the paperwork and we should be good!” And with that you are taken from your now owners paws and placed back into your cage and and carried to the counter where the two exchange paperwork for money and with a wave goodbye and a bidding a good day and good luck to the lion the two of you depart the store.

“This is so cool little guy, my name is Roman, I guess I’m your pet dad now.” He says, chuckling to himself. “I promise you’ll love being mine, I already have a nice place picked out for you and everything, you’re gunna love it!” He says walking. “So, do you have a name or is that something I give you, do you speak much?” He asks and you...

11422.content:
As your vision finally became clear the goddess before you was unmistakable. You've seen her around the shop before looking around, but never seeming to buy anything or anyone for that matter. From her physical appearance she'd make any man her personal bitch. Her breasts were wonderfully sized. Not too big but you'd definitely get lost in those E-cups. Her legs were impossibly long, which was obvious to you despite the size difference. Her hair was long and jet black. Her amber eyes glowed beneath her hair too.

"Hi there little fella. I'm Skylar. I've seen you a lot around here," she said to you with a small grin on her face, thankfully a gentle one. You were always shy around anthros, especially exotic animals like tigers. "Um... hello Skylar. Nice to meet you," you replied quite meagerly. She reached through the cage and softly petted your head with a finger, which admittedly you like and made you smile. "How would you like a home little guy?" she asked, in a rather manipulative way knowing that you loved the petting. "Yes please Skylar. I'd love to have you as my master." Her smile widened and she took you out of the cage to purchase you.

After bringing you home she brought you upstairs into her room and set you down at...

1142311.content:
Hm...

You hadn't seen this customer before. She was a husky, seeming to be fifty feet even, with a layer of grey-white fur covering her admittedly rather attractive body, which sported E-Cup breasts and a large rear, as well as somewhat wide hips. The husky slowly pads around the room in which all the cages were kept, inspecting each human individually.

The husky disappears from view, and her footsteps halt. She must have found someone that attracted her attention. Good for them.

Suddenly, the husky's massive muzzle appears right in front of your cage, and you instinctively shrink back, huddling into yourself and scooting backwards until your back hits the bars of your cage. Damnit, why did you always go like this whenever a furry inspected you?

You feel your cage swing forward and back... Was the husky... Going to buy you?

Unable to cease your body's panic induced huddle, you can only listen as the store owner attempts to convince her to buy a different, and most likely more expensive human. The husky sticks to her guns, however, and before you know it your cage has been placed inside a bag.

Figuring you might as well go to sleep and wake up inside your new mistress' house, you close your eyes and lay on your side, drifting asleep.

Where do you wake up?
1142311.title: A Furry Angel

11423112.content:
You wake to find yourself on top of something very soft and something or someone lightly stroking your head. Still groggy from the nap you took on the way over to where ever you are now you didn't barely move or even give away that you were even awake to the massive woman or girl that was now your owner. After some of the grogginess started to fade way you tried to get your head around the events that have transpired thus far.

"Good morning sweepy head." you heard the voice of someone of the female gender say in a cutesy voice. When you opened your eyes you could easily see that you were around the size of a real world* mouse to this gargantuan beauty. After even more inspection you come to find out that you were laying on her body. You thanked whatever gods that may or may not actually be there for a nice owner.

"H-h-hello." You manage to squeak out nervously. "Hi and let me begin by introducing myself, my name in Jane Nadia° and I guess that I am kind of your new owner." Jane said while putting you down gently and sitting up. All you could do was marvel in the fact that she even recognised you as another intelligent species "Do you have a name?" Jane says to break the silence. "As far as know, I'm pretty sure that's your job." You reply. "Oh yeah, right. I think I'll name you..."

°= Translate Nadia from Corsican to English and you will see my little trick. And yes Corsican is a real language
11423112.title: Body Pillow

choices: "At a pet store and yes I would say she was about as nice as I am to humans"
"At work and absolutely not. I barely convinced her to let me get you."
114231121.content:
"Ace, I'll name you Ace. Is that okay?" Jane said. Surprised at the mere fact that she even asked you if the name was okay. You asked "Are you talking to me?" "Well of course silly. What did think, that I was going to give you some random name and not ask if you liked it? I can see where you are getting the notion from but I am not one of those owners." "Actually, yeah I didn't really think there were any of those mystical anthos that treated humans like another intelligent species actually existed." You replied. "Well, do you like the name?" Jane said expectantly. Not entirely in love with the name, you pondered other names that you liked but decided against saying anything.You didn't really want to find out if merely disagreeing with her would make her snap so you nodded anyway.

"Great! Then I guess for now your name is Ace. Just know that if you aren't okay with the name or if you want me to call you something else just let me know." Jane said excitingly.

A sort of awkward silence fell upon the room.

"Uuuhhhm. You want see around the place?" Jane said to break the silence. "Sure, why not." You replied hapily.

You flinched a little Jane went to pick you up but quickly relaxed. Your stomach churned a little as Jane brought you up to her shoulder. Setting you on her shoulder, Jane began to stride out of the room with a sort of spring to her step. You couldn't discern why exactly but you were shaken from your personal thoughts when Jane introduced the first room.

"This is the bathroom, pretty obvious what it is used for but I have a smaller little stall set up for you in there with a sink, shower, and toilet in there for you. I've been anticipating getting a pet for a while so I have a lot of stuff pre prepared. Speaking of pre-prepared things, do you want some clothes?"

You nod furiously in reply to the very rarely asked question between a giant anthro and their miniature human pet and by very we are talking about almost never asked like only happens every one in a million times an anthro decides to get a new pet.

After getting into your new wardrobe which is mainly comprised of loose fitting black T shirts and boot cut jeans with a couple black sweatshirts on there as well. "You look nice." Jane said as you finished getting dressed "sorry about the generic wardrobe, I wasn't sure what gender of human I was going to get and there weren't very many places that sold clothes at human size." "Ahh it's fine so don't worry to much about it. Either way, this is basically what I wore before the whole, pets turning into giant anthros thing."

"Well that is very convenient, so anyway, back to the tour." Jane bellowed.

"If you would notice on the walls that there are a series of catwalks at about my eye level and when it crosses over the hallway or to something in the middle of the room, it will go over my head and down to the other side. Main use is to get around my house a bit faster."

Next room is the kitchen, again pretty obvious what it is used for but I have a small table set up there for you to use. Do you like the human food they gave you at the store?" "About fifty fifty." You reply truthfully. "Ok then so I'll give you some of what I make for myself for meals for you."

Next we have the guest room but you really shouldn't have any need to go in there at the moment. Here's the living room, again pretty obvious what this room is used for but I do have a chair set there for you. Just FYI I control the remote."

Last but not least, we have your room or well, your part of my room. I have a room set up for you on my nightstand with a bed, a nightstand for you, a lamp, and a closet. Sorry I couldn't give you very many entertainment options in there but I did have a bay window in there so you can watch TV from my TV while I am rather gone or somewhere else in the house. Do out like it?"

"Amazing, but I do have some quick questions and just say something if you aren't comfortable answering any of them." You say. "Sure. Shoot." Jane replied calmly.

Q. How long have been wanting a pet?

A. About a year or two now.

Q. Do you own this house?

A. Yes I do for a matter of fact. Well my name is on the mortgage but both my and my roommate Jessica, she is a Blue Jay anthro, share the payments.

Q. How old are you?

A. 18 almost 19, moved out of my parents about a half a year ago. B-day is in a month.

Q. In the light of you having a roommate, where is she and is she as nice as you to humans?

A. ________________________________
114231121.title: Hello, my name is Ace

1142311212.content:
"At work and absolutely not. I barely convinced her to let me get you. In fact I think she is on her way home right now." Your mind instantly wanders to the thought of some giant bird woman crushing you... not sure if to be terrified or aroused. "Uhhhhm, are you going to be here when she is? Or am I going to be left here with a giantess who hates little people?" You ask worryingly. "Only when I have work which is only for 3 hours a day every day of the week. And speaking of which I have to get to work here in a little bit." Jane replied, trying to reassure you but didn't do very well.

Just then, you hear the jingling of keys and the turning of a door handle. You both look to the door to see a small breasted blue Jay with a large butt and thick thighs standing in the threshold. Sadly the war has being lose, in the beginning they were susceptible to chemical and nuclear weapons but since for the last 7 years the giants has started to organizes between them and his attacks has destroyed any human capacity for fight them directly and if that doesn’t was sufficient they have starting to build giant cities in the areas that they dominate.

Finally the PAG has decided that a new strategy was needed, something new and radical. The Trojan Horse Operation or how it was called for the common soldiers’ operation Pet time who was designed infiltrate some soldiers how pets to the macros in hope for find weaknesses behind the enemy lines.
You was waiting that the Council choose you how first recruit for this mission anmd finally do something significant against the race what take your family and town. Finally you start to notice your fatigue and soon you slept like a baby between all your group.
To the next morning you felt something weird, something that you don’t filled for long years. The commodity of a bed, what make you awake confused. You see that you don’t are in the room with the rest of the soldier instead you rest in a small white room with only a bed and a screen in a wall. Suddenly a voice come form that mentioned screen-God morning Lieutenant Taylor, we sorry foe don’t give you notice of this mission but we know how our dare discipline is and we decide make this the most secret.

Are you saying that I will be part of Operation Trojan Horse?-you exclaim confused

You are our finest element, Mr Taylor , your last data was the vital information that we needed, Today we will change history and make this macros return to the filthy place that they belong.

During the rest of the day they explain you that they will go to leave you in the exterior of the macro city, in the place where the targets going to be located. You notices that your cloth was changed for civil ones and certain gadgets were give to you, a small radio who was inserted in your head like a implant, was rechargeable and activated with your voice and a eye contact with a micro camera for take photos.
Finally after all preparation you go up to a small plain, what will fly near to the city and leave you fall with a parachute near to a place that accord to your data look like a park. The emotion increased every second and when your plain was in fact over the giant city you jump to the vacuum filled with hope. When you are to a height of 5000 ft you activate the parachute and your descend it’s slowed in great measure.

The park where you are landing it’s a strange place, for unknown methods the macros make that the plants starting to grow for be to the same proportion than themselves, what make the place look like a fantasy place. When you finally touch the ground immediately you hide the parachute and with military precision you occult between bushes located near to a road from where your targets will came, a group of girls.

Jean, Amy and Henrietta were the best friends; they have the same age, 17 years, and never see a human with their eyes, making the unique thing that they have in common.

Jean is a slender green iguana, with a row of brown spines in her back and a very long tail, she wears a simple t-shirt and a skirt .she is an extrovert girl who talks always excited.

Amy is a tall and buff goat, his bulky body scarcely fit her adjusted sport suit, she look like be a tomboy but she don’t talk like a stereotypical jock instead she sound very smart and gentle.

Finally was Henrietta, the biggest of the three a chubby hen with a great bust but in contrast with her friend she was dressed in a very modest way, what reflect perfectly her shy personality.

You look to the three with excitation, soon you will make eye contact and that should look in the form more realistic possible way.

The girls was talking about their problems when suddenly they hear a small sound from the bushes. They stop immediately and go to the bushes to investigate, soon that same sound happens again and the three decide examine in detail the bushes.

The plan it’s a success and after a moment of great suspense, you are found for…
1151.title: Mankind last hope

11511.content:
The way between thee branches and leafs of that giant bush make you fell anguish and excited at the same time. You know that e three giantesses are very near beside the fact that you don’t see them, the unmistakable sound of steps and tweets being brokered it’s enough evidence for you.
Suddenly the darkness of your hiding place its interrupted for straight rays of lights, momentary your eyes can see anything, but immediately how the light appear this it’s gone when a big object interpose between you and the sun.
One of the titan monsters finally has spotted you, for an awkward instant was a silence what very soon you will miss.

-Look what I founded! - Exclaims with a loud voice the giant creature.

Immediately you start to feel the temblors of the other two, what bow down around the fat giant, treating of give to you a look. The three animal faces were battling for give you a inspection and how you was expected they was excited of you.

-How a little human come here? - Ask the green one with a firm tone.

Possibly is a kind of prisoner- Respond the one muscled one with the face of a goat.

Well, whatever be the reason, I see he first- exclaims the giant bird in a shallow tone.

No take much time for this three beast start to discuss, apparently they really want have you, but it’s evident that the chicken was the least interested in fight, besides of be the biggest with her 60 ft. of height, what defy the natural limit of 50 ft, she avoid any conflict with her friends.

Excuse me , please, don’t fight for me, I don’t deserve that kind of attention – you interrupt their petty brawl, treating sound sweet and the same time, scared. You immediately notice that your tactic it’s an exist when the three give a collective awww how if you were a nice puppy.

The chicken rapidly extend his hand, what grab you like a small doll and raise you carefully avoiding the pointy tweets of the bush. Sadly this exposition to the air its immediately interrupted when she put you in her breast and hug you like a small baby, the suffocating pressure of her plump arms almost leave your longs without air.
Fortunately one of her friends points to the excited bird, that you look are wriggling excessively and what her should be more careful. Thankfully she obey at the instant and you can breathe again with normality.

-I sorry little one, I never have a little friend, but that don’t excuse of nearly squish you- she talks with a shamed tone.

Your vision of his avian head from a so short distance give you a confused series of emotions, being the first, fear to her terrifying and imposing look, following with your rage against this beings and your wish of kill them all and finally you desire to win this war what mean have to hide yourself with this pathetic façade.

-Thank you for save me of the bad furs, You don’t know how I filled here alone, waiting no be founded for the soldiers.

She instantly down her head with her flexible neck to her chest and with his beak she give you a kiss, what give you chance of look inside her mouth a gigantic hoe what can eat your whole body.
This painful show of emotions it’s interrupted for the others that require the turn for touch you and give you caress. Immediately you turn your head to the giant chicken what for his look she will…
11511.title: Little Lady inside Feathered Fiend

Olapen, pet of a dragon anthro
125.title: Adult (21+ Years)

choices: Dresser, it is the correct place
But the bed will be comfy and nice
141.content:
"Ok liliana, you can have a pet, but taking care of it is a must, I don't want him near me so you have to train him and bring him to school with you, if you lose him, I won't get another so keep him close at all times, and only let someone borrow him under your supervision"
Mom always would say. I knew I would keep him close always, I love those pets, some can be mean though. Some are weird, my mommy said it was something I might think of when I was 13 or so.

I finally make it to the store and immediately find a scared person in the corner of a cage. "It's okay whittle guy, I won't let anyone hurt you again" I put on a brave face for him and hold him against my chest, I walk up to the counter and stand on my tippy toes, " I wana but this guy mista" I say holding this up and bringing out my allowance. I have stuff already for him, my mom told me I would need to

When I get home I realize he is still scared, if I put him in his cage he might get scared. So I walk up the stairs and enter my room I can let him rest on my dresser, talk to him on my bed, or let him think of something.
141.title: Young Child (6-9 Years)

1412.content:
You decide that he will probably be less scared if you laid on the bed at his level. So you go to your bed and spin in a circle before laying down then you place your new pet on your bushy black tail. You always wondered by you spun around before sitting or laying but, your mom said it is just something wolf have always done. You look down at the new pet shivering and pressing himself into your tail away from your face. You find the pointless attempt to be cute so you calmly introduce yourself, "Hi I'm Alison, Alison Wolf but, I'm usually called Ali, I'm going to be your master now so I will take good care of you. Do you have a name?"

He looks up at me as if he didn't expect me to talk to him. He still looks scared which is cute in it's own way and he softly answers, "I... I was told... that I would be given a name." He says with his head down. "So you don't have a name yet?" I say mainly to myself but, he nods anyway. "Well a cute little guy deserves a cute little name so how about Toby."

"Toby?" he replies and I nod with a big smile. "I like it," he says with a small smile, it isn't much but your glad to see that he is warming up to you. In your excitement you forgot that you set him on your tail so a few happy wags sends him flying towards you. With a giggle you say, "Sorry Toby got a little excited there do you want to play a game, see your cage or just get to know each other?" and he replies...
1412.title: bed will be comfy and nice

choices: it's time to show him to mom and dad
14121.content:
Toby looks up to me and asks, "why did you buy me." He pauses seeming unsure of why he is asking, "Most humans are less scared of people then me." It is really cute watching him nervously asking questions so I decide I'll tell him the truth. I lay my head right in front of him and he shivers but doesn't retreat this time. "If I tell you will you promise to keep it a secret?" I ask and he quickly nodes his head.

After a deep breath I tell him, "I have trouble talking to others, when I try to meet new people I get scared and run away. Then I saw you sitting there shacking in the cage and since you are scared of me there's no reason to be scared of you." As I smile at him I slowly bring my hands around him and softly lift him as I turn on my back. "I know your scared but I promise to keep you safe as long as you promise to be my friend." He agrees and...

You decide to play a game with him.

What game did you play?

1412122.title: Something else

info.brief_description: A parallel universe where not only are animals giant anthros, but you're their pet.
info.description:
This story is set in a parallel universe where animals are instead anthros who grow up to 50 feet tall. Houses are adjusted to massive sizes to accommodate for this. Only this time, you're the pet.

Some small rules:
- The pets are intelligent beings and speak and walk like humans.
- No graphic violence.
- Sex and other explicit content is permitted.
- Sex with animals in this world is seen as perfectly normal and fine.
- NO killing off main character(s)
- Please have the chapters make sense.
- The animal size will start off small (they can be held in human arms) but as they get older will quickly outgrow humans.
- The animals will age in human years so to keep it all tidy.
- Exotic animals are perfectly fine as well
- Fictional animals (dragons, Pokemon, etc) are also OK.
- If you choose to be an anthro specify what species you are please, or I'll just pick one at random.

Please add and have fun!
